gui

Class KgmlToGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.KgmlToGraph

  • public class KgmlToGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    Uses the information extracted while parsing to construct a graph of a metabolic pathway, using the GraphStream library. Each reaction is depicted by a rectangular node between nodes representing the substrates and products of the reaction.
    Author:
    Severine Liegeois

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KgmlToGraph(java.lang.String pathNb, java.util.List<Pathway> paths, java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> compounds, java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> reactions, javax.swing.JPanel container)
      Creates a graph displaying a metabolic pathway.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void colorReactions(java.util.List<java.lang.String> species)
      Colors the nodes if only one or two species are selected: one color for each species, and if two are selected, a third color which shows the reaction present in both species.
      void colorReactionsLot(java.util.List<java.lang.String> species)
      Colors the nodes if more than two species are selected.

      Creates a view of the graph and embeds it in a JPanel.
      void kgmlToGraph(java.lang.String pathNb, java.util.List<Pathway> paths, java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> compounds, java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> reactions)
      Places and labels the nodes on the graph, and connects them with edges.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KgmlToGraph

        public KgmlToGraph(java.lang.String pathNb,
                   java.util.List<Pathway> paths,
                   java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> compounds,
                   java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> reactions,
                   javax.swing.JPanel container)
        Creates a graph displaying a metabolic pathway.
        Parameters:
        pathNb - the ID of the pathway
        paths - list of Pathways coming from the kgml files parsing
        compounds - hash table with the ID and name of each compound
        reactions - hash table with the ID and name of each reaction
        container - JPanel which will contain the graph and its legend

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String pathNb,
                 java.util.List<Pathway> paths,
                 java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> compounds,
                 java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> reactions,
                 javax.swing.JPanel container)
        Creates a view of the graph and embeds it in a JPanel. Adds the check box under the graph.
        Parameters:
        pathNb - the ID of the pathway
        paths - list of Pathways coming from the kgml files parsing
        compounds - hash table with the ID and name of each compound
        reactions - hash table with the ID and name of each reaction
        container - JPanel which will contain the graph and its legend

      • kgmlToGraph

        public void kgmlToGraph(java.lang.String pathNb,
                        java.util.List<Pathway> paths,
                        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> compounds,
                        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> reactions)
        Places and labels the nodes on the graph, and connects them with edges. A reaction node is connected to its substrates and products nodes. The edges are oriented.
        Parameters:
        pathNb - the ID of the pathway
        paths - list of Pathways coming from the kgml files parsing
        compounds - hash table with the ID and name of each compound
        reactions - hash table with the ID and name of each reaction

      • colorReactions

        public void colorReactions(java.util.List<java.lang.String> species)
        Colors the nodes if only one or two species are selected: one color for each species, and if two are selected, a third color which shows the reaction present in both species. Adds a legend under the graph.
        Parameters:
        species - list of species selected in the JList
        legend - JPanel containing the legend

      • colorReactionsLot

        public void colorReactionsLot(java.util.List<java.lang.String> species)
        Colors the nodes if more than two species are selected. The nodes are colored with a gradient, from white (none of the selected species possess this reaction) to blue (many or all of the selected species possess it). Adds a legend under the graph.
        Parameters:
        species - list of species selected in the JList
        legend - JPanel containing the legend
